original_text: “If a man gives to his neighbor money or goods to keep safe, and it is stolen from the man's house, then, if the thief is found, he shall pay double.
korean_text: 사람이 돈이나 물품을 이웃에게 맡겨 지키게 하였다가 그 이웃 집에서 도둑을 맞았는데 그 도둑이 잡히면 갑절을 배상할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If a man gives to his neighbor money or goods to keep safe,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 이웃에게 돈이나 물건을 안전하게 지키라고 맡기면,

sentences.original_text: and it is stolen from the man's house,
then, if the thief is found,
